mapper.insert:
insert into t_general
KEY_TYPE,
KEY_CODE,
KEY_VALUE,
SORT_INDEX,
IS_ENABLE,
REMARK,
#{keyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{keyValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sortIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update t_general
KEY_VALUE = #{keyValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT_INDEX = #{sortIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ENABLE = #{isEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where KEY_TYPE = #{keyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and KEY_CODE = #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_general where KEY_TYPE = #{keyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_ENABLE='1' order by SORT_INDEX
